org.jsimpledb

Class JField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsimpledb.JSchemaObject
      • org.jsimpledb.JField
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JComplexField, JCounterField, JSimpleField

    public abstract class JField
extends JSchemaObject
    Represents a field in a Java model object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Converter<?,?> getConverter(JTransaction jtx)
      Get a Converter that converts this field's value from what the core database returns to what the Java application expects, or null if no conversion is needed.
      Method getGetter()
      Get the getter method associated with this field.
      abstract TypeToken<?> getTypeToken()
      Get the type of this field.
      abstract Object getValue(JObject jobj)
      Get the Java value of this field in the given Java model object.
      abstract <R> R visit(JFieldSwitch<R> target)
      Apply visitor pattern.

      • Methods inherited from class org.jsimpledb.JSchemaObject

        getJSimpleDB, getName, getStorageId, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getGetter

        public Method getGetter()
        Get the getter method associated with this field.
        Returns:
        field property getter method, or null if this field is a sub-field of a complex field

      • getValue

        public abstract Object getValue(JObject jobj)
        Get the Java value of this field in the given Java model object. Does not alter the schema version of the object.
        Parameters:
        jobj - object containing this field
        Returns:
        this field's value in jobj
        Throws:
        DeletedObjectException - if jobj does not exist in its associated JTransaction
        StaleTransactionException - if the JTransaction associated with jobj is no longer usable
        IllegalArgumentException - if jobj is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if this field is a sub-field of a complex field

      • visit

        public abstract <R> R visit(JFieldSwitch<R> target)
        Apply visitor pattern.
        Type Parameters:
        R - visit return type
        Parameters:
        target - target to invoke
        Returns:
        value from the method of target corresponding to this instance's type
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if target is null

      • getConverter

        public abstract Converter<?,?> getConverter(JTransaction jtx)
        Get a Converter that converts this field's value from what the core database returns to what the Java application expects, or null if no conversion is needed.
        Parameters:
        jtx - transaction
        Returns:
        Converter from core API to Java, or null if no conversion is required

      • getTypeToken

        public abstract TypeToken<?> getTypeToken()
        Get the type of this field.
        Returns:
        this field's type
